WordTranslation: n.雨 vi.下雨；像雨一样下
Example: It has been raining all night and it looks like it's not going to stop.
ExampleTranslation: 雨已经下了一整晚，并且似乎还不会停。

WordTranslation: n.阵雨 vi.下起阵雨 vt.大量给予
Example: John was showered with congratulations when he was promoted.
ExampleTranslation: 约翰荣升时，大家纷纷向他道贺。

Example: Will you pour me a glass of milk?
According to the weather forecast;it is going to hail tomorrow.
ExampleTranslation: 据天气预报，明天会下冰雹。

Example: Ihere is a blanket of snow over the mountain.
It is beginning to cloud over;you'd better take an umbrella with you.
ExampleTranslation: 这天开始变阴了，你最好带上一把伞。

Example: I hope it will clear up soon.
We tried our best to keep out of the sun.
ExampleTranslation: 我们尽可能不被阳光照到。

Example: The mountain was soon blanketed with snow.
ExampleTranslation: 那座山很快就莜一层雪覆盖了。

Example: The ice in the glass began to melt in the hot sun.
ExampleTranslation: 在炽热的阳光下，杯子里的冰块开始融化了。

Example: The air is thick with dust.
It looks like the miserable weather is going to linger Tor a long time.
ExampleTranslation: 这令人难受的天气似乎将会持续很久。

Example: The temperature is minus 10 degrees Centigrade.
